item.description:
Hi Everyone,

OK OK, I KNOW I SHOULDNT OVER USE A LOCATION..BUT IT LOOKS LIKE RAIN THE REST OF THE WEEK AND POSSIBLY NO CONCERTS..ETC...AND~~~~Its hot as hell, and this is a place too cool your azz..

BESIDES ITS ONLY 25 OR SO MILES FROM hARTFORD.

Bring some chairs, bug spray, food, bug juice, and be ready for a splash. AN INNER TUBE TOO...

I cant afford the upscale WALLET RAPING, NOT ENOUGH FOOD, and sometimes bad tasting wine tasting events in some snooty location...

But if you like that stuff..i think its something you should do instead..(its actually an ok event, i do this at Gouviea Vinyard in the winter) But we are just plain poor folk talking about everyday things anyway..

SO BRING YOUR OWN BUGG JUICE (PREFERABLY THE STUFF IN A BOX) AND simple (or good stuff) FOOD TO HERE...
We can have our own wine and food tasting event and food...

Forget the snoooty french fake accent dude talking about some grapes his father grew..(he didnt) (he lived on some sewer canal)..... but in reality bought some Carlo Rossie and put it in some hand blown bottle and put a picture of himself on it stomping on some grapes in barefoot pose...then sold it to some New Yorkers for 100 buck a bottle...
and to you for 25 because you are at this special invitation event and paid 25 bucks just to get in and to taste it... mann... and he will give you a 2 doolar a bottle discount if you buy a case of it...He wants to get rid of the LEAD in the glass real fast so he wont be poisoning his own self..

I WILL HAVE THE BARBIE Q AND SOME WINEO..from the private stock cellar..i think its from the famous Carlo Rossie secret collection that the french dude used...LOL...
I will sell you some at 5 bucks a bottle....it says 5 Brothers on the label...
I think it even has a picture of these really big RED grape like looking things and some garlick....emmmmmm..


I PROMICE I WONT LIST THIS PLACE EVER AGAIN SO YOU WONT GET WORN OUT OF ITS LOCATION...

ok i also listed this event on my other sites because it looks like the only event this entire work week...maybe the weekend too if it looks rainy..

Thats it cant ever go back here again..LOL


Description:
DIRECTIONS:
From Interstate 91 to Parking lot

Take Exit 47 East. Go eastbound 2.7 miles on RT-190 (Hazard Avenue) from Enfield to Hazardville.

At intersection of RT-190 and North/South Maple (RT 192) turn right (South) onto South Maple.

Parking is at the barn on the right located right before the bridge. OR DIRECTLY AFTER THE BRIDGE...

From Interstate 84 via RT-190 to Parking and HQ: 1: Take the RT-190 West Exit and follow RT-190 West through Stafford Springs and Somers to Hazardville (Intersection R-190 and RT-192).
2: At stoplight, turn left on to South Maple.
3: Parking is at the barn located by the bridge.

apx 1 - 100 South Maple, Hazardville (Enfield) ct 06082 for a GPS (Just follow the directions above).

OK WE WILL BE NEAR THE WATER OR CLOSE ENOUGH,BUT LOOK FOR THE ORANGE 6 FOOT TALL POLE/ or cones/ green sign SLOW ADULTS AT PLAY...THATS MY IDENTIFIER..
see you there if you are interested...
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Orange cones, Orange Pole, Yellow Slow Adultsat Play Sign

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: PFD test out...no kayaks
